Description
appv2.cards
Provides everything that has something to do with the game cards.
Their implementation and effects.

Provides the core classes necessary to run this application.

This package contains all necessary controller for the view.

    BaronTalus.playCard(PlayerController PC, boolean bPlayedManually, String messageForPlayerWhenForced, StringBuilder stdoutPipeline, StringBuilder stderrPipeline)
    Special Effect:
    When discarded the player can compare his hand with another player (ACard.RC_CHOOSE_ANY_PLAYER_SELF_EXCLUDED).

    As written in the rules.
    int
    GuardOdette.playCard(PlayerController PC, boolean bPlayedManually, String messageForPlayerWhenForced, StringBuilder stdoutPipeline, StringBuilder stderrPipeline)
    Special Effect:
    When discarded the player must guess the affection of another player's card in hand (ACard.RC_CHOOSE_ANY_PLAYER_SELF_EXCLUDED_WITH_INTEGER).
    int
    HandmaidSusannah.playCard(PlayerController PC, boolean bPlayedManually, String messageForPlayerWhenForced, StringBuilder stdoutPipeline, StringBuilder stderrPipeline)
    Special Effect:
    When discarded the player is protected until his next turn by any card effects from other players (ACard.RC_OK).
